pkgmetadata.longdescription: Arduino IDE 2.x is a modern, open-source IDE for Arduino development. Based on the Eclipse Theia framework, it provides features like autocompletion, code navigation, live debugger, and a unified interface for managing libraries and boards.
Arduino IDE 2.x 是用于 Arduino 开发的现代开源集成开发环境。 基于 Eclipse Theia 框架构建，提供自动补全、代码导航、实时调试器 以及统一的库和开发板管理界面等功能。
